price: 28. Dan mereka tidak mempunyai ilmu tentang itu. Mereka tidak lain hanyalah mengikuti dugaan, dan sesungguhnya dugaan itu tidak berfaedah sedikit pun terhadap kebenaran.
arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
